dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: President Tokayev just had a call with Iran's new president, Masoud Pezeshkian.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: President Tokayev just had a call with Iran's new president, Masoud Pezeshkian.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev held a phone conversation with Iranian President Masoud Pezeshkian, according to a statement from the Akorda press service.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, right, for Qurban Ait—that's a big holiday, isn't it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, right, for Qurban Ait-that's a big holiday, isn't it?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The two leaders exchanged greetings on the occasion of Qurban Ait, a sacred holiday for Muslims around the world.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and they uh, seemed pretty happy with how Kazakhstan-Iran relations are going.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and they uh, seemed pretty happy with how Kazakhstan-Iran relations are going.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Tokayev and Pezeshkian expressed satisfaction with the steady development of Kazakhstan-Iran relations, built on friendship and good neighborliness.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: I mean, that's good to hear. Did they talk specifics, like trade or anything?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I mean, that's good to hear. Did they talk specifics, like trade or anything?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: They did! They discussed expanding trade and investment, plus upcoming bilateral meetings.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They did! They discussed expanding trade and investment, plus upcoming bilateral meetings.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During the conversation, they discussed prospects for expanding trade, economic and investment cooperation, as well as the schedule of upcoming bilateral meetings, the statement said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: So, like, they're really pushing for stronger ties, huh?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, like, they're really pushing for stronger ties, huh?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. It sounds like both sides are on the same page about building on friendship and good neighborliness.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. It sounds like both sides are on the same page about building on friendship and good neighborliness.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Tokayev and Pezeshkian expressed satisfaction with the steady development of Kazakhstan-Iran relations, built on friendship and good neighborliness.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: You know, it's interesting—Iran's got a new leader, so this call probably sets the tone.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You know, it's interesting-Iran's got a new leader, so this call probably sets the tone.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. And Tokayev's been pretty active lately with diplomatic calls, like with Poland too.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, he's definitely keeping those international channels open.

dialogue_turns.text: Do you think we'll see more collaboration between Kazakhstan and Iran soon?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Do you think we'll see more collaboration between Kazakhstan and Iran soon?
